decoworld.model.world.dungeon

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.model.world.dungeon.Room
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Lobby

    public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    A room within a pre-constructed dungeon that holds the tiles for that particular region of the dungeon Map.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Room()
      Constructor that sets up the internal containers of the Room state.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPeer(Bearing bearing, Room peer)
      Adds a peer Room to this Room's list of surrounding peers.
      int distance()
      The number of Room's an entity must pass through to reach this one from the Lobby Room.
      void generateTiles()
      Internal function that generates the Tile layout for this Room.
      DungeonGenerator getDungeonGenerator()
      A getter for the internal random dungeon generator.
      Room getParent()
      A getter for the Room's parent Room which it connected to.
      java.util.Map<Bearing,Room> getPeers()
      A map that binds peer Room's if they exist to their respective Bearing relative to this Room.
      Array2D<Tile> getTiles()
      A getter for the internal array of Tiles that represent this Room.
      int getX()
      A getter for the Room's x coordinate within the dungeon.
      int getY()
      A getter for the Room's y coordinate within the dungeon.

      A setter for the internal random dungeon generator.
      void setParent(Room parent)
      Sets the Room's parent Room which it is connected to.
      void setPosition(int x, int y)
      Sets the Room's x and y coordinates within the dungeon to the coordinates given.

    • Method Detail

      • addPeer

        public void addPeer(Bearing bearing,
           Room peer)
        Adds a peer Room to this Room's list of surrounding peers.
        Parameters:
        bearing - the side of this Room to connect the given one to.
        peer - the object that represents the Room being attached.

      • generateTiles

        public void generateTiles()
        Internal function that generates the Tile layout for this Room.

      • distance

        public int distance()
        The number of Room's an entity must pass through to reach this one from the Lobby Room.
        Returns:
        the number of Rooms it takes to reach this.

      • getDungeonGenerator

        public DungeonGenerator getDungeonGenerator()
        A getter for the internal random dungeon generator.
        Returns:
        the DungeonGenerator instance for this dungeon.

      • setDungeonGenerator

        public void setDungeonGenerator(DungeonGenerator generator)
        A setter for the internal random dungeon generator.
        Parameters:
        generator - the DungeonGenerator instance for the preferred dungeon dimensions.

      • getX

        public int getX()
        A getter for the Room's x coordinate within the dungeon.
        Returns:
        the Room's x coordinate.

      • getY

        public int getY()
        A getter for the Room's y coordinate within the dungeon.
        Returns:
        the Room's y coordinate.

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(int x,
               int y)
        Sets the Room's x and y coordinates within the dungeon to the coordinates given.
        Parameters:
        x - the Room's x coordinate.
        y - the Room's y coordinate.

      • getParent

        public Room getParent()
        A getter for the Room's parent Room which it connected to.
        Returns:
        the Room's parent Room.

      • setParent

        public void setParent(Room parent)
        Sets the Room's parent Room which it is connected to.
        Parameters:
        parent - the Room's parent Room.

      • getPeers

        public java.util.Map<Bearing,Room> getPeers()
        A map that binds peer Room's if they exist to their respective Bearing relative to this Room.
        Returns:
        a map of the Room's four bearings and their associated Rooms.

      • getTiles

        public Array2D<Tile> getTiles()
        A getter for the internal array of Tiles that represent this Room.
        Returns:
        the Array2D object that holds the Tile objects.
